scripts.trigger-fetch-event: sam local generate-event cloudwatch scheduled-event | sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/FoodDaysApiStack.template.json --env-vars env.json -e - fetch-data-handler
scripts.trigger-parse-event: sam local generate-event s3 put --key=sourcedata/wikipedia | sam local invoke -t ./cdk.out/FoodDaysApiStack.template.json --env-vars env.json -e - parse-data-handler
scripts.start-api: cdk synth && sam local start-api -t ./cdk.out/FoodDaysApiStack.template.json --env-vars env.json --warm-containers lazy
